title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser 

(Minister for Justice) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister justice) order 2024

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser
heading: 2. Caroline Murphy, particulars of whose address have been deposited at
text_raw:
2. Caroline Murphy, particulars of whose address have been deposited at 
the offices of the Department of Justice, is appointed to be a Special Adviser to 
the Minister for Justice, with effect from 3 January 2024. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal 
of the Government, 
27 March, 2024. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 5th April, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [129] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
